item.title: The 20 Scariest Twins In Horror Movie History Ranked
item.description: Horror movies with scary twins are always incredibly memorable, and the genre is filled with many incredibly creeping same-age siblings.

item.title: Oscar Hopeful Film Conclave Passes Major Box Office Milestone Even As It Releases On Digital
item.description: Conclave, which has hopes of becoming an Oscar darling in the coming months, has just passed an important milestone at the domestic box office.

item.title: 10 Major Actors You Forgot Were In War Movies
item.description: The genre's most high-profile cameo appearances, featuring the likes of Harrison Ford, John Krasinski, and Johnny Depp, to name a few.
